actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Fanged Tentacles and two Slams or it makes three Slams. It can replace two Slams with Chomp.

actions.name: Fanged Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 9 (2d4+4) piercing damage + 9 (2d8) poison and target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends the target is restrained and mortifera can't use its Fanged Tentacles on another.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 10 (1d12+4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Chomp
actions.desc: One creature grappled by mortifera is pulled up to 5 ft. to mortifera's central maw which chomps on creature. Target: 10 (3d6) piercing damage and 13 (3d8) poison (DC 15 Str half).

actions.name: Poison Spray (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Sprays poison from its central maw in a 30' cone. Each creature in that area: 27 (6d8) poison (DC 15 Dex half).

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless indistinguishable from bed of lotus flowers.

special_abilities.name: Poisonous Tendrils
special_abilities.desc: A creature that starts its turn grappled by the mortifera must make DC 15 Con save or be poisoned for 1 min. A poisoned creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.
